Switch Input

The switch input should be used only to turn something on/off, or choose between yes and no.

This could be in an email preference setting, to say if a location is maneuverable, etc..

For other cases when switching between views, utilize the Switch Control.

                                    
<!-- on the root element set the dir attribute for rtl display format -->
<html lang="en" dir="rtl">
    [code goes here]
</html>

<!-- html of the element doesn't change from LTR -->
    
    
// _switch-rtl.scss

html[dir="rtl"] input {
    &[type=checkbox].cmx-switch {
        margin-right: 0rem; // modified
        margin-left: 0.375rem; // added

        & + label{

            &::before{
                margin-right: 0rem; // modified
                margin-left: 0.375rem; // added
            }

            &::after{
                right: 2px; // added
                left: 0; 
            }
        }

        &:checked {
            & + label{
                &::after {
                    top: 2px;
                    left: 0px; // modified
                    right: 26px; // added
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
